description: Dated 1950 C.E.; ergo- +‎ -nomy +‎ -ic, from Ancient Greek: ἔργον (érgon, “work”) and νόμος (nómos, “distribution”).

adjectives.description: ergonomic (comparative more ergonomic, superlative most ergonomic)

entries.meaning: Of or relating to the science of ergonomics.
Designed for comfort or to minimize fatigue.
